docs.text: Creating a build ¶ The server software must be built before it can be run. Windows OSX/Linux Using command prompt , git bash , or powershell , run: ./publish.cmd <release | debug> <os> Using terminal , run: ./publish.sh <release | debug> <os> os ( Optional ) The operating system to build the server against. If not specified then the server will be built for the same operating system. win osx ubuntu.14.04 ubuntu.16.04 , ubuntu.18.04 ubuntu.20.04 Linux Mint linuxmint.17 linuxmint.18 , linuxmint.19 , ubuntu.20.04 for v20 debian.9 , debian.10 fedora.32 , fedora.33 , fedora.34 centos.7 , centos.8 redhat.7 , redhat.8
docs.title: Creating a build

docs.text: Installation ¶ Windows OSX Linux Prerequisites ¶ Download and install the latest .NET 6 SDK Download and install from here Tip Use Git Bash as your command prompt. This can be found in the Windows Start Menu after installation. Install ModernUO ¶ Navigate to the folder where you want to install ModernUO. Using Git Bash run: git clone https://github.com/modernuo/modernuo cd modernuo Prerequisites ¶ Download and install the latest .NET 6 SDK . Using terminal , install homebrew and git: /bin/bash -c " $( curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh ) " brew install git Install ModernUO ¶ Using terminal , navigate to the folder where you want to install ModernUO and run: git clone https://github.com/modernuo/modernuo cd modernuo Prerequisites ¶ Download and install the latest .NET 6 SDK . Using bash , install git: sudo apt update && sudo apt install git Note The command to install git might be different for your flavor of linux. Consult your local Google search for answers. Install ModernUO ¶ Using bash , navigate to the folder where you want to install ModernUO and run: git clone https://github.com/modernuo/modernuo cd modernuo
docs.title: Installation
